reviews.review:
포탈1의 장점과 새로운 스토리,퍼즐로 무장한 포탈2는 전작에 비해 확실히 재밌게 진화했다.
안해보신분이 계시다면 한번쯤 해보는 것을 추천하고 싶다.
개인적으로는 포탈3가 나왔으면 좋겠지만 우리에게 그런건 있을수가 없어...
No suprise from our savior Gaben. Amazing gameplay and physics and tear-dropping ending! Really really loved the game.

Bello, un gioco intelligente e ricco di innovazioni, complessivamente bello quanto il suo predecessore e sebbene lo sviluppo della storia sia meno fizzante e velato rispetto al primo capitolo, questo sequel aggiunge molta più profondità ai personaggi e alla trama, in un'avventura decisamente immersiva più vicina allo stile narrativo di Half Life.
Enorme univers vraiment attachant :)

This is a review!
不用多说，V社经典中的经典，剧情和关卡设计的非常棒不会太简单也不会很烧脑，创意工坊的加入也使得游戏的耐玩度得到非常大的提升。

Basically one of the best games ever made.

If you want to play something fun, challenging, unique, and most importantly,  hilariously entertaining, this is the only game you'll find that does hits all of those marks perfectly.

It's a part of video game history, sits proudly in the Hall of Fame. If you haven't played it, do it now.

2016  Yılında “Sarılmaya En Çok İhtiyacı Olan Kötü Adam” Ödülünü Vermiştim . ( yine olsa yine veririm :) )
neyse ben anlatayım oyunu birazcık

Oyun hoş küçük süprizlerle dolu . bir kerede olsa gülebileceğinizin garantisini ben veriyorum ! ( Wheatley ve Glados un atışmaları sayesinde :D ) 

bakalım (+) yönlerine

(+) Oyunun hikayesi efsane ( önce Portal1 i oynamayı unutmayın . )
(+) CO-OP modu sayesinde hem oyunun kendi tasarladığı "Multiplayer Mapları" nda gerek arkadaşlarınızla gerek yabancılarla oynayabiliyorsunuz. Bunlarla sınırlı değil ! Atölyeden indirdiğiniz Mapları da CO-OP oynayabilmeniz mümkün.
(+) Gizemleri ve Atmosferleri ÇOK BÜYÜLEYİCİ .
(+) Oyunun karakterleri gerek saf gerek korkutucu oluyor en güzel kısmıda bu ya :)

birde (-) yönleri var tabii.

(-) Beyinsizler için zor bir oyun :D
(-) Hikayeyi anlamadan oynamak , oyundan zevk almamanızı sağlıyor malesef :(

Fiyatına değermi bilmem ama bir süre sonra sıkar.
Şuan 3.10 TL kaçmaması gereken bir oyun :)

У Portal 2 есть огромный, страшный, безобразный изъян. Её мало. 14 часов одиночной кампании и «коопа» пролетают мгновенно, словно летний сон. Рука так и тянется к «New Game», чтобы пройти игру снова, наслаждаясь умными головоломками и острыми, как лезвие бритвы, репликами героев. Но в одну реку не войти дважды — чертова память цепко держит каждую задачку. Остается слушать божественную арию из финального ролика и уповать на скорую амнезию. Или выход DLC — смотря что произойдет быстрее.
One of the greatest games ever made

Tolles Spiel mit super Atmosphäre und knackigen Rätseln. Neben sympathischen Androiden und einem diabolischen OperatingSystem, bietet Portal 2 Portalwaffen, glibrige Flüssigkeiten und einen Humor von dem sich viele andere Spiele eine Scheibe abschneiden könnten.
Can never have enough of this game,  puzzles and dialog are awesome

Of all the puzzle games I like playing, this one has kept me laughing and gives me pull my hair out moments of frustration. 

I am looking forward to co-op mode when my friends and I can get online at the same time! LOL

If you are looking for a great game with awesome graphics, action and gameplay, then I recommend this one highly. I don't recommend this game for people who hate getting stuck.

Well worth the money!
神作，最近黑五折扣也比较大，想入的玩家可以入手。游戏可玩度较高，有些关卡设置的很有意思。双人联机也十分好玩，强力推荐。好评！！！！！！！！！！！

The first one was already great, but this one is better in every way.
Great story, great humor, great pacing, great puzzles, new puzzle mechanics,...
Highly recommend.
Wheatly for the win

Some folks may not think so but I personnaly believe that this game improves on its predecessor in every single way. The music and sound design is incredible, the graphics are very well polished, story is exellent and the gameplay is butter smooth. Remember to play Portal before this one, or you'lll miss out on a lot. Remember also to play this after you've finished Portal. Enjoy!

[h1]Overall 9/10[/h1]

The way out of Aperture Labotories is full of wastes and dangers.
But it would be funny if you are with the powerful Portal Device and our "friendly" GLaDOS and Wheatley.
If you are tired of sovling the puzzles, just take the time and don't miss those ironic illustrations everywhere.
Fun, laughs, damn good writing and hours of testing... for science!
a really amazing game

Hi.
Un jeu qui utilise un très vieux concept le FPS ( ou le Doom-Like comme disent les vieux comme moi ! ). Mais Portal détourne ce type de gameplay pour en faire un jeu de reflextion et de casse-tête. Donc un très bon jeu pas cher. En plus pour quelques euros de plus Portal 2 et une évolution supérieure a l'original, car il rajoute humour et une durée de vie infinie avec les maps de la communauté.
